entry.value: import knime.scripting.io as knio%%00010import pandas as pd%%00010import numpy as np%%00010%%00010from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split%%00010from sklearn.neural_network import MLPClassifier%%00010from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score, classification_report%%00010%%00010# === 1. Read KNIME input table ===%%00010df = knio.input_tables[0].to_pandas()%%00010print("Python OK. Rows:", len(df))%%00010%%00010# === 2. Separate features and target ===%%00010# assume 'is_core' is already 0/1%%00010feature_cols = [c for c in df.columns if c != "is_core"]%%00010%%00010X = df[feature_cols].values.astype("float32")%%00010y = df["is_core"].values.astype("int32")%%00010%%00010# === 3. Train / test split ===%%00010X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(%%00010 X, y,%%00010 test_size=0.2,%%00010 random_state=42,%%00010 stratify=y%%00010)%%00010%%00010# === 4. Build FFNN model (MLP) ===%%00010mlp = MLPClassifier(%%00010 hidden_layer_sizes=(32, 16), # 2 hidden layers%%00010 activation="relu",%%00010 solver="adam",%%00010 learning_rate_init=0.001,%%00010 max_iter=200,%%00010 random_state=42%%00010)%%00010%%00010mlp.fit(X_train, y_train)%%00010%%00010# === 5. Evaluate on test set ===%%00010y_prob = mlp.predict_proba(X_test)[:, 1]%%00010y_pred = (y_prob >= 0.5).astype("int32")%%00010%%00010print("Test accuracy:", accuracy_score(y_test, y_pred))%%00010print("Classification report:\n",%%00010 classification_report(y_test, y_pred, digits=3))%%00010%%00010# === 6. Build output table for KNIME ===%%00010test_df = pd.DataFrame(X_test, columns=feature_cols)%%00010test_df["is_core_true"] = y_test%%00010test_df["is_core_pred"] = y_pred%%00010test_df["prob_core"] = y_prob%%00010%%00010knio.output_tables[0] = knio.Table.from_pandas(test_df)
